QuestData.Title: Heroic: The Celestial Planetarium
QuestData.Description: Listen, $glad:lass;! Azeroth's fate is at stake here.$B$BOur only chance is to get to the Celestial Planetarium in time to find this Algalon and stop him from beaming back any messages to his Titan masters.$B$BLocate the Celestial Planetarium and come back with any information you get. We might still have some time to prepare for Algalon's arrival.
QuestData.LogDescription: Prospector Loren at the Archivum in Ulduar wants you to locate the entrance to the Celestial Planetarium.
QuestData.RewardText: It's locked? Figures!$b$bI'll let Brann know... maybe he can uncover something in the Archivum.
